title: Titane
description: An ancient settlement, long known to have been located near the modern town of Titani in Greece. It has been the subject of intensive archaeological excavation and survey only in the 21st century. The acropolis, of which significant fortification walls remain visible, is now occupied in part by the Church of Ag. Tryphon.

properties.description: Location determined in Google earth with reference to text and maps in Tytgat 2006. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Centerpoint of acropolis
